about_the_game:
Developers quote: " Diablo 2 meets Skyrim in a epic tale with its own lore ! "

Harnessing the power of elemental magic, you select your affinity

among the primordial forces: fire, water, earth, wind—

In the realm of Everdawn, the ancient threat known as the Void looms ominously,

seeking to engulf the world in eternal chaos.

As a chosen wielder of light and arcane energies, you embark on a perilous quest to thwart this malevolent force.

Roaming through diverse landscapes, your presence stirs the dormant darkness, forcing its sinister denizens to materialize.

In battle, each vanquished foe releases shimmering Void orbs, relics brimming with corrupted energy.

By aiding the enigmatic seer Zara, a guardian of ancient wisdom, you unlock the secrets of these orbs.

Zara's guidance empowers you with passive skills and insights, purchased through the harmonious synthesis of light and Void.

Embark on an expedition through the vast expanse of the Town map, a sprawling zone

teeming with otherworldly wonders.

Each corner of this mysterious realm unveils unique worlds adorned with fantastical flora

and eccentric fungi, a testament to the realm's enigmatic history.

Amidst your exploration, encounter five peculiar shops offering exotic wares and arcane

artifacts essential for your quest.

Safeguard your discoveries within the confines of your home chest, the sole sanctuary in

this unpredictable landscape where treasures remain secure against the encroaching chaos.

To expand your storage capacity, seek out ancient runes scattered across the land.

These mystical items serve as enchanted pouches, enhancing your ability to safeguard

and organize your burgeoning collection of relics and curiosities.

Venture deeper into the world, find ancient ruins, long forgotten by time.

Loot these venerable sites to uncover relics of immense power and untold secrets,

piecing together the cryptic tapestry of Everdawn's past while fortifying your resolve against

the encroaching Void.

** Magic Only **

**No weapons**

Delve into a realm of endless gear combinations and unique traits, where every choice shapes your destiny!

Thus, armed with elemental prowess and guided by ancient wisdom, you venture forth

into the heart of Everdawn to cleanse the land of the encroaching shadows and restore

balance to a world on the brink of oblivion.

Descend into treacherous dungeons, where each step brings peril and potential.

In these shadowed depths, every defeat exacts a heavy toll:

loss of precious loot and hard-earned passive skills.

Yet, amid the danger lies unparalleled opportunity for gear progression, with each delve yielding

rare materials vital for enhancing your power.

A special merchant is hidden in the caverns on the HARD and INSANE dungeons.

The hidden merchants offer's items crucial to gear progression.

Harness the ancient arts of crafting and alchemy at specialized stations strewn across the realm.

Master the art of potion brewing, where the initial refining process yields a bountiful harvest, providing

an invaluable advantage in your quest against the encroaching Void.

Utilize the spoils of your conquests to fashion bespoke gear, each piece a testament to your prowess

and resilience. Merge the essence of your discoveries into formidable equipment, forging a legacy destined to defy chaos.

Craft and refine potions at special stations.

Refining the first stage of potions yields twice the input.

Through meticulous refinement, forge potent elixirs that can turn the tide of battle.

Potion of uncertain demise of power: Drink this and get 7x damage multiplier for 2 minutes.

50% chance to die upon drinking.

Stand firm against the onslaught, for the fate of Everdawn hangs in the balance.

Only through cunning strategy and unwavering determination can you safeguard the sanctity of your crystal and

push back the relentless waves of the Void.

Summon forth relentless waves of adversaries, drawn like moths to the flame of your unwavering resolve.

As the enemy masses converge upon your sanctuary, fortify its defences with a strategic array of towers,

each a testament to your mastery of arcane engineering.

With every tower built and upgraded, bolster the crystal's protection against the relentless tide of Void.

Unleash the elemental energies at your command, infusing each structure with the power to repel and

vanquish the encroaching chaos.

**Alpha has 1 tower model that can be upgraded x3.**

One Lane per map.

If the crystal gets hit by ONE enemy, you loose.

Full body physics; you can trip and fall. Be thrown.

Same for enemies.

First beginners guide

Check youtube link in the right steam panel
On top of Discord link

*** Tutorial is 16 min. You will need minimum 1 hour of gameplay to NUKE ***

Alpha is solo

Open world town map.

Called Hall of heroes.

Shop keep that keeps player listings.

3 dungeons with each its unique boss.

Extractor type dungeons with exit portals.

Tower defence map.

3 waves to select from.

1 tower to build and upgrade x2

Current state of game:

*Alpha*

*** One person studio ***

Studio Promises:

Will NEVER be or will NEVER have:

- Pay to win

- Crypto infused

- DLC packs extra $

- Paying for character storage.

- Hidden Charges

- Subscription Based.

- Account levels. silver/gold...

Beta will be Co-op 2-6 players per map.

-Destructible environment.

-Mount system.

-Player driven economy.

  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Use SSD or NVME not hardrives.

short_description: You are a mage from a chosen element. Defeat the Void by purifying them with magic. Explosions and chaos will ensue!
